**Challenge:**
The goal here is to predict whether or not a product will be put on backorder status, given a number of product metrics such as current inventory, transit time, demand forecasts and prior sales. Itâ€™s a classic Binary Classification problem.

*Code:*

### Loading libraries

::: {.cell hash='04_H20_II_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-1_def5058994e9052c5c9ce133fc052753'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tidymodels)
library(magrittr)
library(dplyr)
library(sjmisc)
library(magrittr)
library(haven)
library(sjlabelled)
library(rsample)
library(recipes)
library(rstanarm)
library(broom.mixed)
library(h2o)
```
:::


### Loading the training & test dataset

::: {.cell hash='04_H20_II_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_8d9e385d472a3bb2e8fed30e059c1a88'}

```{.r .cell-code}
product_backorders_tbl <- read.csv("product_backorders.csv")
split_obj <- initial_split(product_backorders_tbl, prop = 0.8)
train_readable_tbl <- training(split_obj)
test_readable_tbl  <- testing(split_obj)
```
:::
